panelInformations.title: 素材とお手入れ方法、修理
panelInformations.description:
To ensure the longevity of your garment, we strongly advise you to carefully read the following information and recommendations:

- Store in a cotton garment cover (never in plastic)

- Store the garment in a dry and cool space

- In case of rain or snow, hang it up to dry and clean it delicately with

  a soft cloth to remove any stains

- Care by a fur specialist only  (do not dry-clean)
panelInformations.introduction: Louis Vuitton takes great care to respect the very strong regulations which govern the fur universe: no endangered animal species are used for its clothing.
